attributes.action: A judicial review of the governments prerogative use, to take UK in to EEC
attributes.background: The  UK entered into the EEC using the parliamentary  prerogative, can the government use the same process to leave or not, if not then the European communities Bill, and all associated amendments including the Lisbon treaty, will be null and void.

rejection.details:
Judicial review is a court process. The courts are responsible for it. You can read more about it here:

https://www.judiciary.gov.uk/you-and-the-judiciary/judicial-review/

You can find out how to initiate a judicial review here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/administrative-court-bring-a-case-to-the-court
